backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to five bouncing emoji spans in App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of main frontend files including styles, Tailwind config, and core components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions using red OKLCH palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app logic handling view states, evasive 'No' button behavior, heart bursts, and acceptance transition.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates and animates floating heart particles using timed intervals.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Creates an 8â€‘heart radial burst animation at a given click location.
Centered card-style layout wrapper with blurred background and padding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend canister actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, stored identity, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended Tailwind-based romantic theme plus custom heart animations, bursts, and evasive button transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, versions, and existing features for a project replacing emoji spans.
